byline.original: By ALEXANDER BURNS and MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM

abstract: Progressive Agenda Committee, advocacy group founded by New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, abandons efforts to hold forum in Iowa on income inequality; brings end to de Blasio's initial attempt to influence economic debate in 2016 presidential campaign.
lead_paragraph: The Progressive Agenda Committee, founded by Mayor Bill de Blasio, said the forum had become unnecessary, because inequality had already moved to the center of the 2016 presidential campaign.

headline.main: Mayor de Blasio’s Group Abandons Plans for Inequality Forum in Iowa
headline.print_headline: Mayor’s Group Abandons Plans for a Forum on Income Inequality in Iowa

snippet: The Progressive Agenda Committee, founded by Mayor Bill de Blasio, said the forum had become unnecessary, because inequality had already moved to the center of the 2016 presidential campaign.
